H0.text: is the united states a country or nation. Sovereign State

H1.text: is the united states a country or nation. Republic

H2.text: is the united states a country or nation. Federation

H3.text: is the united states a country or nation. country

A4.text: The United States of America (USA), also known as the United States (U.S.) or America, is a country primarily located in North America.

A5.text: It is a federal republic of 50 states and a federal capital district, Washington, D.C.

A6.text: In the example of the United States, the original 13 British colonies became independent states after the American Revolution, each having a republican form of government.

A7.text: Any state joining the union later was also required to be a republic.
